item.title: Dev Log: Boboman - Day 2
item.author: cancheta.dev@gmail.com (Charles Ancheta)
item.description: MAJOR BUG ALERT!! Apparently my collision logic for the bombs weren’t going to hold up. Every time a bomb explodes, there is a small time window where you can place a bomb and the bomb would not recognize the player, making it a “not new” bomb. Because of that, the player gets pushed off right away and could end up in the weirdest of places. After hours of debugging I couldn’t really solve it because of how the collision library orders the entity updates.
